source.generate: SCHEMA: md(name, salary, manager) INSTANCE: md(name: "Bob", salary: "1000", manager: "John")

target.generate: SCHEMA: emp(name, dept, salary, manager) INSTANCE: emp(name: "Bob", dept: "Marketing", salary: "1000", manager: "John") emp(name: "John", dept: "Marketing", salary: "2000", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "John", dept: "Marketing", salary: "3000", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "Mark", dept: "Staff", salary: "1000", manager: "Frank") emp(name: "Frank", dept: "Sales", salary: "2000", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "Frank", dept: "Sales", salary: "2500", manager: "Carl") emp(name: "Carl", dept: "Managment", salary: "5000", manager: "Carl")

scenario.dependencies:
ExtEGDs: e1: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), emp(name: $n2, dept: $d2, salary: $s2, manager: $m2), $n1 == $n2 -> $d1 == $d2.
e1b: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), emp(name: $n1, dept: $d2, salary: $s2, manager: $m2) -> $d1 == $d2.
e2: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), emp(name: $n2, dept: $d2, salary: $s2, manager: $m2), $n1 == $n2, $d1 == $d2, $d1 == "Sales" -> $m1 == $m2.
e4: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), md(name: $n2, salary: $s2, manager: $m2), $n1 == $n2 -> $m1 == $m2.
e5: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), emp(name: $n2, dept: $d2, salary: $s2, manager: $m2), $m1 == $m2, $s1 < $s2 -> $d1 == $d2.
DCs: d1: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), emp(name: $n2, dept: $d2, salary: $s2, manager: $m2), $n1 == $n2, $d1 != $d2 -> #fail.
d2: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), emp(name: $n2, dept: $d2, salary: $s2, manager: $m2), $n1 == $n2, $d1 == $d2, $d1 == "Sales", $m1 != $m2 -> #fail.
d3: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), $d1 == "Staff", $s1 != 1000 -> #fail.
d4: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), md(name: $n2, salary: $s2, manager: $m2), $n1 == $n2, $m1 != $m2 -> #fail.
d5: emp(name: $n1, dept: $d1, salary: $s1, manager: $m1), emp(name: $n2, dept: $d2, salary: $s2, manager: $m2), $m1 == $n2, $s1 < $s2 -> #fail.
